price: 62 Je me contente de vous transmettre, en toute sincérité, le message de mon Seigneur qui m’a révélé des choses que vous ignorez.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anṣaḥu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
